record.title: REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 760
record.narrative:
REMOVAL OF NAME OF MEMBER AS COSPONSOR OF H.R. 760 -- (House of Representatives - January 17, 2008)

[Page: H334]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to remove my name as a cosponsor of H.R. 760.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from West Virginia?
